short_summary: Transport Canada is seeking a consulting firm to provide project management services for rail passenger demand in Southwestern Ontario and develop a business case for transportation projects.
description: The proposed contract seeks the services of an expert consulting firm and any sub-consultants (Advisor) with expertise in railway planning, engineering and operations, and transportation project business case development to support an analysis of the present and future rail passenger demand in SWO; evaluate existing routes, building on an assessment of operating capacity and infrastructure constraints; identify new alignment options as needed; propose three (3) options to improve the frequency and reliability of service in the southern Toronto-London-Windsor rail corridor, reflecting three service scenarios and propose two (2) options to improve London-Sarnia passenger rail service reflecting two service scenarios.
